title: Implement Disconnect Peers for Useless response in snapsync

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
- snapsync which loops on bad peers

Partial implementation in the PR below. 

Context in #4651

Found an unhandled error in the debug logs that appears to be killing the snapsync process. This is on a mainnet FOREST node:
